Translations.Text: religi! - Religi de your patr Abraham. Li est 1 who nom vi Submitters originally! Tiel messenger serv witness vi vi dejxor witnesses among des popol. Do vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) ten fast DI; Li est your Lord put Lord put Supporter. . . [23:1] Successful ja est believers
who est reverent dum their Kontakt Prayers (Salat)
Ili evit vain talk
Ili don their obligatory charity (Zakat)
Ili argument their chastity
Nur kun their spouses those est rightfully theirs do ili hav sexual relations; ili ne est blamed
Those transgress these lim est transgressors
When gxi ven depon konfid al them tro as any agreements ili far ili est trustworthy
Ili observ their Kontakt Prayers (Salat) regularly
Such est inheritors
Ili hered Paradise wherein ili abide forever
Ni kre human est el nepr kind da kot
Subsequently ni reproduced him tiny gut ej put protekt repository

Tiam ni developed gut into pend (embryo) tiam developed pend (embryo) into bite-size (fetus) tiam kre bite-size (fetus) into ost tiam kovr ost karn. Ni tiel produkt neo creature. Ben est DI put Creator
Tiam later sur, vi mort
Tiam Tag Resurrection vi resurrected
Ni kre vi 7 univers tavol ni est neniam unaware de single creature them
Ni send down cxiel akv exact mezur tiam ni store gxi muel Certainly ni let gxi escape
Kun gxi ni produkt por vi orchards de dat palm grapes all kinds da frukt various foods
Ankaux arb indigxen al Sinai produkt ole ankaux as frand eaters
livestock proviz vi lecion. Ni let vi trink (lakt) el their bellies vi deriv ali benefits el them kelk da them vi uz por food
Sur them sur sxip vi rajd
Ni send Noah his popol dir O my popol worship DI. Vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi ne est righteous
Estr disbelieved his popol dir This est ne plur than human vi wants gajn prominence vi. Hav DI willed Li send angxel! Ni neniam auxd anything this our ancestors
Li simply hom ir crazy Just ignor him por awhile
Li dir My Lord grant me victory ili disbelieved me

Ni tiam inspir him Far watercraft our watchful okul en accordance kun our inspiration! When our komand ven atmosphere bol up put gxi par de cxiu kind (da your domesticated best) your famili escept those kondamn doomed Ne parol al Me sur behalf da those transgressed ili dron
Once vi sald together those est vi watercraft vi dir ‘Lauxd DI por sav us el evil popol
Dir ‘My Lord let me disembark ben location; Vi est bon deliverer
These proviz sufficient proofs vi! Ni certainly put vi test
Subsequently ni establ another generaci post them
Ni send al them messenger el them dir Vi worship DI! Vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi ne est righteous
Estr his popol disbelieved rejected ide Hereafter - Kvankam ni proviz por them generously en this life - Dir This est ne plur than human est vi! Li mangx el ki vi mangx trink as vi trink
Se vi obe human est vi tiam vi est really losers
Li promes vi vi mort turn into polv ost vi ven re
Impossible impossible ja est ki promes vi
Ni nur viv this life - Ni viv mort! - Kaj ni neniam resurrected
Li est just hom fabricated mensog atribu them DI! Ni neniam kred him
Li dir My Lord grant me victory ili disbelieved me
Li dir Baldaux ili est sorry
retribution strik them equitably do ni torn them ruin. wicked popol pere
Subsequently ni establ ali generaci them
Ne community advance its predetermined sort nor delay gxi
Tiam ni send our messengers en succession. Cxiu temp messenger ir his community ili disbelieved him. Consequently ni annihilated them 1 ali far them histori! Popol disbelieved pere
Tiam ni send Moses his frat Aaron our revelations profound proof
Al Pharaoh his elders ili torn arrogant! Ili est oppressive popol
Ili dir ni kred 2 hom whose popol est our sklav
Ili rejected 2 kaj consequently ili annihilated
Ni don Moses scripture ili direkt
Ni far fil Mary his mother sign ni don them rifugx mesa food drink
O vi messengers mangx bon provisions work righteousness! Mi est fully aware da cxio vi do
Such est your congregation - 1 congregation - Mi est your Lord vi reverence Me
Ili larm into disput factions; each parti felicx ki ili hav
Do just las them their confusion por awhile
Do ili opini ekde ni proviz them mon infan
Ni dusx them blessings? Ja ili ne hav ide
Surely those est reverently conscious de their Lord
who kred en revelations their Lord
Kaj who neniam set any idols their Lord
As ili don their charities their kor est fully reverent. Ili recognize ti ili summoned their Lord
Ili est eager do righteous works ili kondur en doing them
Ni neniam sxargx any anim its means ni keep record utters truth. Ne 1 sufer injustice
their mens est oblivious al this ili commit works do ne conform this; their works est evil
Tiam when ni requite their estr retribution ili plend
Ne plend nun; vi don all help el us
My proofs prezent vi vi torn your kalkan
Vi est tro arrogant akcept them vi defiantly disregarded them
Why ili ne reflect this scripture? Ili ne realize ke ili Do ricev io hav neniam ating their ancestors
Ili failed recognize their messenger? this ili est disregarding him
Ili decid ke li hav est crazy Ja li brought truth them plej de them hate truth
Ja se truth conformed their wishes tie est chaos heavens ter; cxio them corrupted Ni don them their proof ili disregarding their proof
Vi pet them wage Your Lord's wage est far put. Li est put Provider
plej assuredly vi invit them rekt path
Those disbelieve Hereafter surely deviate dekstr path
Eben when ni dusx them kun mercy, relieved their problem ili plongx profund transgression ad blunder
Ecx when ni aflikt them retribution ili neniam torn their Lord imploring
Subsequently when ni requited them severe retribution ili incurred ili shocked
Li est 1 who granted vi auxd eyesight cerb! Rarely est vi appreciative
Li est Unu establ vi ter kaj Him vi summoned
Li est Unu controls life death Li est 1 who alternates nokt tag. Vi ne kompren
Ili dir ki their ancestors dir
Ili dir Post ni mort igx polv ost ni get resurrected
Such promes don us our parents en des preter. These est ne plur than tales el preter
Dir, "Al whom aparten ter everyone gxi se vi kon
Ili dir, "Al DI. Dir tiam vi ne pren heed
Dir Who est Lord de 7 univers; Lord de great dominion
Ili dir DI. Dir tiam vi ne torn righteous
Dir En whose man est all sovereignty all ajx Li nur unu proviz help bezon neni help vi est kon
Ili dir DI. Dir Kie vol vi ir wrong
Ni don them truth while ili est liars
DI NENIAM begotten FIL. Nor est tie ever any ali di Him. Otherwise each di deklar independence his creations ili kondur each ali por dominance! DI GLOR; far their PRETEND
Knower de all sekret declarations; Li exalted far hav partner
Dir My Lord Vi montr me (retribution) ili incurred
My Lord let me ne est unu de transgressing popol
Al montr vi (retribution) ni rezerv them est io ni easily do
Do counter their evil works goodness; ni est fully aware da their pretend
Dir My Lord mi streb rifugx Vi el flustr diabl
Mi streb rifugx en Vi my Lord lest ili ven me
When death ven 1 de them li dir My Lord send me
Mi tiam work righteousness cxio mi las. Ne ver! This est false pretend li far. barrier separate his anim this mond resurrection
When korn ne blov relations them ekzist ke tag nor vol ili zorg 1 another
As por those weights est heavy ili est winners
Those weights est light est unu perd their anim; ili abide Infer forever
Fajr overwhelm their vizagx ili last miserably therein
Ne est My revelations recited vi vi kept rejecting them
Ili dir Our Lord our wickedness overwhelmed us ni popol ir astray
(Our Lord pren us out da this; se ni return our old behavior) tiam ni est really wicked
Li dir Abide therein humiliated ne parol al Me
Grup My servants uz dir ‘Our Lord ni kred tial forgive us dusx us kun mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Vi mok ridiculed them extent ke vi forges Me Vi uz rid them
Mi rekompenc them hodiaux dors their steadfastness far them winners
Li dir "Kiel long vi last ter? Kiel many jar
Ili dir Ni last tag part de tag! Pet those counted
Li dir En fakt, vi rest brief interim vi nur kon
Vi opini ni Did kre vi en vain vi ne est returned us
exalted est DI prav Suveren! tie ne est ali di Him; plej Honorable Lord possessor all auxtoritat
Anyone idolizes DI any ali di any kind da proof li reckoning ripoz his Lord disbelievers neniam sukces
Dir My Lord dusx us forgiveness mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
sura ni send down ni dekret legx. Ni revealed klar revelations ke vi pren heed
adulteress adulterer vi vip each da them cent lashes Ne swayed per kompat port di legx se vi ver kred en DI Last Tag! let grup believers witness their penalty
adulterer end marrying adulteress idol worshiper adulteress end marrying adulterer idol worshiper! This prohibited believers
Those akuz married women adultery tiam fail produkt 4 witnesses vi vip them 80 lashes ne akcept any testimony el them; ili est wicked
Ili pent afterwards reform tiam DI est Forgiver Merciful
As por those akuz their own spouses any ali witnesses tiam testimony akcept li jxur DI 4 temp li telling truth
oath est incur di condemnation him li mensog
Sxi konsider innocent sxi jxur DI 4 temp li est liar
oath incur di wrath her li telling truth
This est di grace mercy vi! DI est Redeemer SAGX

gang vi produkt grand mensog Ne opini gxi est mav vi; instead gxi est bon por vi. Meanwhile each unu de them earned his akci guilt. As por 1 who iniciat whole incident li incurred terrible retribution
When vi auxd gxi kred hom kred women hav bon thoughts themselves dir This est obviously grand mensog
Nur ili produkt 4 witnesses (vi kred them)! Ili fail produkt witnesses tiam ili est DI liars
Se gxi est por di grace vi His mercy en this mond Hereafter vi sufer great retribution this incident
Vi fabricated gxi your own lang ripoz de vi ripet gxi your busx sen proof Vi pens est simpl when gxi est DI gross
When vi auxd gxi vi dir Ni ne ripet this. Glory est Vi. This est gross falsehood
DI ADMON VI KE VI NENIAM do GXI RE VI est believers
DI TIEL EKSPLIK revelations VI. DI est Omniscient SAGX
Those am seg immorality stern believers incurred painful retribution en this life Hereafter DI kon, while VI NE KON
DI DUSX VI His grace mercy! DI est Kind towards believers Merciful
O vi kred ne sekv sxtup Satan! Anyone sekv sxtup Satan kon ti li advokat evil vice Se gxi est por di grace vi His mercy neniom da vi purified Di purifies whomever Li vol. DI est Hearer Knower
Those among vi ben rimed wealth est charitable towards their relativ poor those immigrated DI. Ili trakt them kun kindness tolerance; vi ne am ating di forgiveness? DI est Forgiver Merciful
Surely those falsely akuz married women est pi believers incurred condemnation en this life Hereafter ili incurred horrendous retribution
Tag ven when their own lang man fut bor witness cxio ili done
Sur tag DI testament requite them fully por their works ili testament trov out ti DI est Truth
Mav women mav hom mav hom mav women bon women bon hom bon hom bon women Des latter est innocent de such accusations. Ili ating forgiveness generous rekompenc
O vi kred ne enter hejm ali than yours permission el their inhabitants greeting them! This est put vi ke vi pren heed
Vi trov ne 1 them ne enter them vi obtain permission! Vi told Ir vi ir This est pur por vi. DI EST fully aware da CXIO VI do
Vi ne commit error entering uninhabited hejm wherein tie est io aparten al vi! DI kon CXIO VI reveal CXIO VI conceal
Tell kred hom ili subdue their okul ne stare women argument their chastity! This est pur por them. DI EST fully Cognizant DE CXIO ILI do

Kaj tell kred women subdue their okul argument their chastity! Ili ne reveal any part de their korp ti which est neces! Ili kovr their kest ne relax this kod presence their husbands their patr patr their husbands their fil fil their husbands their frat fil their frat fil their sisters ali women vir servants employees sexual sxofor nullified infan ne reached puberty. Ili ne strik their fut when ili marsx en ord sxancel reveal nepr detal their korp! All da vi pent DI O vi believers ke vi sukces
Vi encourage those de vi est single get married Ili marry righteous among your vir female servants ili est poor DI testament enrich them His grace DI est Bounteous Knower

Those ne afford get married argument morality DI proviz por them el His grace Those among your servants wish liber en ord marry vi grant them their wish once vi realize ti ili est honest! Don them di mon Li bestowed vi. Vi ne force your girls commit prostitution streb sxtof this mond ili wish est cxast! anyone forces them tiam DI vid ili forced est Forgiver Merciful
Ni revealed vi clarifying revelations ekzempl preter generaci enlightenment por des righteous

(DI est light DE heavens TER. allegory His light est ti de concave spegul lamp ej vitr uj. Vitr uj est bril pearl-like stel. fuel thereof supplied ben oil-producing arb ke est nek eastern nor western Its ole est preskaux self-radiating; ne fajr ignite gxi! Light upon light DI DIREKT His light whoever VOL DIREKT). DI TIEL cites parables POPOL. DI est fully aware da all AJX
Di guidance trov dom exalted DI His nom commemorated therein! Glor Him therein tag kaj nokt
Popol ne distr per negoc meti commemorating DI; ili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) ili est conscious de tag when mens okul horrified
DI testament certainly REKOMPENC them their BON works DUSX them His grace DI proviz por whomever LI VOL LIM

As por those disbelieve their works est mirage dezert. thirsty ul opini gxi est akv! when li reaches gxi li trov gxi est nothing li trov DI tie instead requite him fully his works DI est PLEJ efficient reckoner
Another allegory est de est total darkness violent ocean ond ond ankaux al dik nebul! Darkness darkness - Li rigard his own man li barely seg gxi. Whomever DI deprives de light ne hav light
Vi ne realize ke everyone heavens ter glor DI eben bird as ili flug kolon? Each kon its prayer its glorification. DI EST fully aware da CXIO ILI do
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter al DI est final destiny

Vi ne realize ti DI driv nub Do tiam gathers them together tiam piles them sur each ali tiam vi seg pluv ven them? Li send cxiel loads negx kovr whomever Li vol while diverting gxi el whomever Li vol! brightness negx preskaux blind okul
DI controls NOKT TAG. This est lecion those posed okul
Di kre cxiu viv creature el akv! Kelk da them marsx their bellies kelk marsx 2 krur kelk marsx 4. DI KRE whatever LI VOL. DI est Omnipotent
(Ni send vi clarifying revelations tiam DI direkt whoever vol direkt) rekt path
Ili dir Ni kred en DI messenger ni obe tiam kelk da them slide dors afterwards! These est believers
When ili invit DI His messenger jugx them kelk da them renvers
Se judgment est their komplez ili readily akcept gxi
est tie disease their kor? Est ili doubtful? Est ili afraid ti DI His messenger trakt them unfairly? En fakt, est ili est unjust
Nur utterance believers whenever invit DI His messenger jugx their afer est dir Ni auxd ni obe. These est winners
Those obe DI His messenger reverence DI observ Him these est triumphant unu
Ili jxur DI solemnly vi komand them mobilize ili mobilize! dir ne jxur. Obedience est obligation. DI EST fully Cognizant DE CXIO VI do
dir Obe DI obe messenger. ili rifuz tiam li est responsible his obligations vi est responsible por your obligations. Vi obe him vi direkt. Pland duty messenger est liver message

DI PROMES those VI kred PLUMB righteous life KE LI FAR them SUVEREN TER as LI did POR those ANTAUX them KAJ ESTABL POR them RELIGI LI chosen them substitute PAC security them en met DE TIM! All this because ili worship Me sol; ili neniam set any idols Me Those disbelieve this est des ver wicked
Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) obe messenger ke vi ating mercy
Ne opini those disbelieve ever get gxi Their final abode est Infer; ki miserable destiny

(O vi kred permission requested your servants infan ne ating puberty entering your cxambr)! This est est done en 3 instances - Dawn Prayer noon when vi sxangx your vest ripoz Nokt Prayer. These est 3 privat temp vi. Je ali temp ne est wrong vi them mingle 1 another DI TIEL clarifies revelations VI. DI est Omniscient SAGX
Once infan reach puberty ili pet permission (antaux entering like those igx adults them pet permission (antaux entering DI TIEL clarifies His revelations VI. DI est Omniscient SAGX)
elderly women ne expect get married commit nothing wrong per relaxing their vest kod proviz ili ne reveal tro mult de their korp! Argument modesty est put them. DI est Hearer Knower

Blind ne est blamed crippled ne est blamed nor handicapped blamed just as vi ne est blamed por mangx your hejm hejm your patr hejm your mothers hejm your frat hejm your sisters hejm your patr frat hejm your patr sisters hejm your mothers' frat hejm your mothers' sisters hejm aparten al vi vi posed their klav hejm your amik! Vi commit nothing wrong mangx together as individu! When vi enter any hejm vi greet each ali greeting el DI ben kaj bon. DI TIEL EKSPLIK revelations VI VI KOMPREN

Prav believers est those kred en DI His messenger kaj when ili est him community meeting ili do ne las him permission! Those pet permission est unu kred en DI His messenger. Ili pet your permission en ord tend al kelk da their afer vi grant permission whomever vi wish pet DI forgive them! DI est Forgiver Merciful

Ne trakt messenger's requests vi trakt each others' requests DI EST fully aware da those among VI sneak FOR uz flimsy PRETEKST. Let them beware - those disobey his mend - Por disaster strik them severe retribution
Absolutely al DI aparten cxio heavens ter! Li fully kon cxiu stat vi est en. Tag vi returned Him Li inform them de cxio ili done DI est fully aware da all AJX
Ben est 1 revealed Statut Libr His servant li dejxor warner des whole mond
al whom aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter! Li neniam hav fil nor does Li hav any partners sovereignty! Li kre cxio exact mezur; Li precisely desegn cxio
sed ili set beside Him di ne kre anything - Ili kre - who ne posed potenc ecx harm benefit nor do ili posed any potenc control life death resurrection
Those disbelieved dir This est fabrication li produkt help kelk ali popol. Ili uttered blasphemy falsehood
Ili ankaux dir Tales el preter li skrib ili dikt him tag kaj nokt
Dir This revealed des Unu kon Sekret heavens ter! Li Forgiving Merciful
Kaj ili dir "Kiel ven this messenger mangx food marsx merkat? Se nur angxel ven him dejxor him preacher
Aux Se nur trezor don him! Aux nur li posed orchard el which li mangx! transgressors ankaux dir Vi sekv sorcx hom
Not kiel ili vok vi all kinds da nom kaj kiel this plumb them astray neniam trov their voj dors
Ben est 1 can Li vol don vi mult put than their postul! - Gxarden flu streams many mansions
En fakt, ili disbelieved Hor (Tag Resurrection) ni prepar those disbelieve Hor flaming Infer
When gxi seg them el afar ili auxd its rage haladz
Kaj when ili jxet gxi narrow met all shackled ili deklar their remorse
Vi ne deklar just single remorse ke tag; vi sufer great numer remorses
Dir Est this put etern Paradise ke promes por des righteous? Gxi est their put ind rekompenc; put ind destiny
Ili get anything ili wish therein forever This est your Lord's irrevocable promes
Tag when Li summons them together idols ili set DI Li hav dir vol vi misled these servants de Min Hav ili ir astray sur their own
Ili dir Vi glor ne est dekstr us set any lords Vi. Vi allowed them gxu together their parents Consequently ili disregarded message tiel igx wicked popol
Ili disbelieved message vi don them consequently vi can nek protekt them el retribution ili incurred nor can vi help them en any voj Anyone among vi commits evil ni commit him severe retribution
Ni ne send any messengers vi ne mangx food marsx merkat! Ni tiel test vi per each ali vi steadfastly persevere Your Lord est Seer
